text: (pin æti dæya karana) ovun (nodænuvatva sidu vana) alpa væradi misa, anit visala papayangenda, avaman gena dena karanavangenda æt vi sitinu æta. niyata vasayenma obage deviyan samava dimehi itamat apramanavatya. obava pasvalin nirmanaya kala avasthavedi obage (gati gunayan) ohu hondin danneya. oba, oba mavage kusehi (mamsa pindayak vasayen) sængavi tibu avasthavehida, (obava ohu hondin danneya). ebævin oba, obava parisuddhavantayin yayi (aropanaya) kara noganu. (obagen) parisuddhavantayin kavurunda yanna ohuma hondin danneya
